Method Detail

addCampaign

public VindiciaReturn addCampaign(java.lang.String srd,
                                  Product product,
                                  AutoBillItem item,
                                  java.lang.Boolean applyToBillingPlan,
                                  java.lang.String campaignCode,
                                  java.lang.Boolean dryrun)
                           throws VindiciaServiceException
Adds a campaign discount to an existing AutoBill. The 'product' or 'item' parameters may be used to limit the items to discount. If neither is specified, the discount will be applied to all items eligible for the campaign.

Parameters:
srd - sparse return descriptor
product - Product to apply the campaign discount to. This product should already exist in CashBox. The discount will be applied to any AutoBillItem on the specified AutoBill that includes this product. Only one of the 'item' or 'product' parameters may be included.
item - AutoBillItem to apply the campaign discount to. This item should already exist in CashBox and be associated with the specified AutoBill. Only one of the 'item' or 'product' parameters may be included.
applyToBillingPlan - If true, the campaignCode (if supplied) will be applied to the price of the BillingPlan associated with this AutoBill. May be combined with a discount AutoBillItem or Product. Default is false.
campaignCode - Coupon or promotion code for the campaign to apply to this AutoBill
dryrun - If "dryrun" is true, all computations on the AutoBill will be done, but no result from this operation will be recorded in Vindicia's database. This is useful for computing the cost of an AutoBill without committing to the change. No payment method validations, authorizations or charges will be done if "dryrun" is true.
Returns:
object containing information about success, failure, etc for this call
Throws:
VindiciaServiceException

addCharge

public VindiciaReturn addCharge(java.lang.String srd,
                                java.lang.String sku,
                                java.lang.String description,
                                java.lang.String taxClassification,
                                java.math.BigDecimal amount,
                                java.lang.String currency,
                                Token token,
                                java.lang.Integer quantity,
                                java.lang.String campaignCode,
                                java.lang.Boolean dryrun)
                         throws VindiciaServiceException
Adds a non-recurring charge to an AutoBill

Parameters:
srd - sparse return descriptor
sku - SKU for charge added to AutoBill. If SKU is specified (and matches a Product merchantProductID), and amount is null, an attempt will be made to determine the charge amount from the Product.
description - A description of the charge. This is a free-form string of 256 or fewer characters.
taxClassification - tax classification for charge. This field is required UNLESS the price is to be based on the SKU, (in which case the tax classification can be based on the associated Product tax classification).
amount - Amount to charge. This field is required UNLESS the price is to be based on the SKU.
currency - ISO 4217 currency code for amount. Either token, OR currency must be specified.
token - Token associated with amount (if this is a Token-based autobill). Either token, OR currency must be specified.
quantity - Optional value to be included in charge. Defaults to 1, if not specified
campaignCode - Optional coupon or promotion code, used to obtain a discount on this charge. If a campaignCode is used, a valid SKU must also be provided.
dryrun - If "dryrun" is true, all computations on the AutoBill will be done, but no result from this operation will be recorded in Vindicia's database. If the AutoBill did not exist before, it won't exist afterward; if it did exist before, it won't change. This is useful for computing the cost of an AutoBill without committing to the change. No payment method validations, authorizations or charges will be done if "dryrun" is true.
Returns:
object containing information about success, failure, etc for this call
Throws:
VindiciaServiceException

cancel

public AutoBillCancelReturn cancel(java.lang.String srd,
                                   boolean disentitle,
                                   boolean force,
                                   java.lang.Boolean settle,
                                   java.lang.Boolean sendCancellationNotice,
                                   java.lang.String cancelReasonCode)
                            throws VindiciaReturnException,
                                   VindiciaServiceException
Cancels an AutoBill. Use the force flag to allow cancelling within a commitment period.

Parameters:
srd - sparse return descriptor
disentitle - If true, also immediately disentitles the Account associated with this AutoBill for relevant Products.
force - If true, allows cancelling even if within a defined commitment period.
settle - If true, an attempt will be made to settle the autobill (either refunding the customer for a portion of the pre-paid usage that will not be available, or charging the customer for non-recurring-charges that the customer has not yet paid for). How the AutoBill is settled will be reflected by the Transactions/Refunds included in the output. If not specified, the default value for this field is false.
sendCancellationNotice - If true, sends cancellation email. If false, no cancellation email will be sent. If not specified, the default value for this field is true.
cancelReasonCode - Optional reason code for cancelling the AutoBill
Returns:

vid - Vindicia ID for the AutoBill. (If you give this ID for any item in the AutoBill's upgrade history, we will return the entire series.)
Returns:
array of AutoBillUpgradeHistoryStep objects - Array of steps in the AutoBill's history
Throws:
VindiciaReturnException - for non-200 return codes from Vindicia
VindiciaServiceException

makePayment

public AutoBillMakePaymentReturn makePayment(java.lang.String srd,
                                             PaymentMethod paymentMethod,
                                             java.math.BigDecimal amount,
                                             java.lang.String currency,
                                             java.lang.String invoiceId,
                                             PaymentOverageDisposition overageDisposition,
                                             java.lang.Boolean usePaymentMethodForFutureBilling,
                                             java.lang.String note)
                                      throws VindiciaReturnException,
                                             VindiciaServiceException
makes a payment against an AutoBill

Parameters:
srd - sparse return descriptor
paymentMethod - The dtlink=PaymentMethod used for this Payment.
amount - Amount to pay.
currency - ISO 4217 currency code for amount. This must match the currency used for charges on the current invoice (if not specified, the AutoBill/Invoice currency will be used).
invoiceId - ID of Invoice to make payment against. If not specified, the oldest unpaid invoice for this AutoBill will be selected for payment.
overageDisposition - How to disposition amounts in excess of a required AutoBill payment amount. Defaults to applyToOldestInvoice if not specified
usePaymentMethodForFutureBilling - Update the AutoBill to use the included PaymentMethod for future billing. Not Currently Supported
note - Note regarding payment being made
Returns:
AutoBillMakePaymentReturn - custom return bean class for this method
Throws:
VindiciaReturnException - for non-200 return codes from Vindicia
VindiciaServiceException

                              java.util.Calendar nextPeriodStartDate,
                              MigrationTransaction[] migrationTransactions,
                              java.lang.String cancelReasonCode)
                       throws VindiciaServiceException
Migrates AutoBills from an external system into Vindicia's billing system.

Parameters:
srd - sparse return descriptor
nextPeriodStartDate - The next scheduled billing date for this AutoBill. If not provided, it will be assumed that this AutoBill is terminal and no future billings are to be scheduled.
migrationTransactions - The MigrationTransactions that define the history of this AutoBill. At a minimum, the most-recent Transaction for this AutoBill must be included.
cancelReasonCode - Optional reason code for cancelling the AutoBill
Returns:
object containing information about success, failure, etc for this call
Throws:
VindiciaServiceException

modify

public AutoBillModifyReturn modify(java.lang.String srd,
                                   boolean billProratedPeriod,
                                   java.lang.String effectiveDate,
                                   BillingPlan changeBillingPlanTo,
                                   AutoBillItemModification[] autoBillItemModifications,
                                   java.lang.Boolean dryrun)
                            throws VindiciaReturnException,
                                   VindiciaServiceException
Modifies the BillingPlan and/or the AutoBillItems associated with an existing AutoBill.

Parameters:
srd - sparse return descriptor
billProratedPeriod - If true, and effectiveDate is 'today', new items will be billed for the prorated remainder of the current billing period, and prorated credits will be issued for previously billed items.
effectiveDate - 'today' or 'nextBill' to make the modifications effective immediately or on the next billing date, respectively.
changeBillingPlanTo - A BillingPlan to replace the BillingPlan currently on the AutoBill. This BillingPlan must already exist in the Vindicia system.
autoBillItemModifications - An array of AutoBillItem changes to apply to the AutoBill.
dryrun - Set to true, to only report what would have happened without committing.
Returns:
AutoBillModifyReturn - custom return bean class for this method
Throws:
VindiciaReturnException - for non-200 return codes from Vindicia
VindiciaServiceException

                                                     java.lang.Boolean force,
                                                     java.lang.Boolean amountOnly)
                                              throws VindiciaReturnException,
                                                     VindiciaServiceException
Quotes settlement amount that will be generated by an AutoBill.cancel/disentitle/settle call.

Parameters:
srd - sparse return descriptor
force - If true, a settlement quote will be generated even if the minimumCommitment for the AutoBill has not been satisfied. Default value is FALSE.
amountOnly - If true, only the settlement amount will be calculated. If false, Transactions / Refunds providing settlement details will be generated. Default value is FALSE.

update

public AutoBillUpdateReturn update(java.lang.String srd,
                                   ImmediateAuthFailurePolicy immediateAuthFailurePolicy,
                                   java.lang.Boolean validateForFuturePayment,
                                   java.lang.Integer minChargebackProbability,
                                   java.lang.Boolean ignoreAvsPolicy,
                                   java.lang.Boolean ignoreCvnPolicy,
                                   java.lang.String campaignCode,
                                   java.lang.Boolean dryrun,
                                   java.lang.String cancelReasonCode)
                            throws VindiciaReturnException,
                                   VindiciaServiceException
Creates a new AutoBill object or updates an existing one.

Parameters:
srd - sparse return descriptor
immediateAuthFailurePolicy - How to respond to Authorization failure while processing first Transaction for an AutoBill. Defaults to doNotSaveAutoBill
validateForFuturePayment - Validate the payment method for future payments if initial Transaction is not being created/Authorised. AutoBill will not be saved if validation is requested and fails.
minChargebackProbability - If Chargeback Probability from risk scoring is greater than this, the transaction will fail. Default is 100 (all payment methods are applied).
ignoreAvsPolicy - Set to 1, to not evaluate any custom or default avs policy.
ignoreCvnPolicy - Set to 1, to not evaluate any custom or default cvn policy.
campaignCode - Optional coupon or promotion code, used to obtain a discount on this AutoBill
dryrun - If "dryrun" is true, all computations on the AutoBill will be done, but no result from this operation will be recorded in Vindicia's database. If the AutoBill did not exist before, it won't exist afterward; if it did exist before, it won't change. This is useful for computing the cost of an AutoBill without committing to the change. No payment method validations, authorizations or charges will be done if "dryrun" is true.
cancelReasonCode - Optional reason code for cancelling the AutoBill
Returns:
AutoBillUpdateReturn - custom return bean class for this method
Throws:
VindiciaReturnException - for non-200 return codes from Vindicia
VindiciaServiceException
